XHEADER.Title: Script To Update Elements in XML.

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:PSET &UC4RB_XML_FILE_NAME# = &UC4RB_FILE_PATH# :PSET &UC4RB_XML_XPATH_RESULT_FILTER# = "FIRST"
:DEFINE &PATH_ARRAY#, string, 2 :SET &PATH_STRING# = "/l7Item/l7Resource/l7Bundle/l7References/l7Item/l7Type&/l7Item/l7Resource/l7Bundle/l7References/l7Item/l7Resource/l7Policy/l7PolicyDetail/l7PolicyType" :FILL &PATH_ARRAY#[] = STR_SPLIT(&PATH_STRING#,"&")
:DEFINE &ELEMENT_ARRAY#, string, 2 :SET &ELE_STRING# = "<l7Type>POLICY</l7Type>&<l7PolicyType>INCLUDE</l7PolicyType>" :FILL &ELEMENT_ARRAY#[] = STR_SPLIT(&ELE_STRING#,"&")
:SET &RUNVAR# = 1 :SET &LEN# = 2
:WHILE &RUNVAR# LE &LEN# ! Invoke the job for updating elements in xml : PSET &UC4RB_XML_XPATH# = &PATH_ARRAY#[&RUNVAR#] : PSET &UC4RB_XML_ELEMENT_STRING#= &ELEMENT_ARRAY#[&RUNVAR#] : SET &ACTOBJ# = ACTIVATE_UC_OBJECT("PCK.AUTOMIC_XML.PUB.ACTION.UPDATE_ELEMENT",WAIT,,,,PASS_VALUES)
: IF &ACTOBJ# = "0" : SET &ERRNR# = SYS_LAST_ERR_NR() : SET &ERRINS# = SYS_LAST_ERR_INS() : SET &MESSAGE# = GET_MSG_TXT(&ERRNR#,&ERRINS#) : PRINT "ERROR: Invoking RETRIEVE_TEST_STATUS Job :&MESSAGE#" : SET &SUCCESS# = 1 : ELSE : SET &STATUS# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(,&ACTOBJ#,"RETCODE") : IF &STATUS# <> "0" : PRINT "ERROR: RETRIEVE_TEST_STATUS Action failed. Error Status [&STATUS#]. Please check the job report for RUNID: [&ACTOBJ#]." : SET &SUCCESS# = 1 : ENDIF : ENDIF :SET &RUNVAR# = &RUNVAR# + 1 :ENDWHILE
